original: intros d m a s H. unfold preDTA_kill in H. destruct d. - intro contra. discriminate contra. - simpl in H. destruct (states_kill m s) eqn:E. + exists s0. auto. + discriminate H. - simpl in H. destruct (preDTA_kill m d1) eqn:E1. + destruct (preDTA_kill m d2) eqn:E2. * inversion H. exists s1. split. { reflexivity. } { apply st_kill_1 in H. destruct H as [s' [H1 H2]]. apply H1. } * discriminate H. * discriminate H. + discriminate H.
